member.name: T:Zodiac.ZodiacCaculator
member.summary: This class will compute and return a zodiac sign based on the day and month of birth. The zodiac sign in English, Vietnamese

member.name: M:Zodiac.ZodiacCaculator.GetZodiacEnglish(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: This method will return a zodiac sign in English based on the day and month of birth

members.member:
This method converts/translate a zodiac sign in English to Vietnamese
The zodiac sign in English" The zodiac sign in Vietnamese
